text: hi my name is Megan I'm 16 years old
this isn't the story of the time my
younger sister and I rode our bikes to
help put an end to multiple sclerosis
we've been participating in an annual
Bike Ride for MS for three years now our
mom was diagnosed with MS seven years
ago
girls you forgot your water bottles we
ride in this bike event to help raise
money for research and to help people
with MS and their families my whole
family does the ride my sister my dad
and my mom it's a big family effort we
went to friends family neighbors and
school mates and asked for donation we
were wondering if you donate to the Bike
MS event that we're doing sure along so
right 100 mile Wow we like participating
in the ride because it feels like we're
helping and that feels really good I
also ride for those who can't in the
hope that someday they will be able to
and that's our story the time we rode
our bikes to help put an end to multiple
sclerosis enjoy the ride you just
watched a TT Ayyad Disney Channel
